body: Holy shit, the first one is like doujin adaptation of game Kangoku/Prison Academia. I'm waiting so much for translate and more chapters!!! Anyone know artist name here?
@thuanz1997 it's the cover of Kangoku Academia, an eroge game by Lilith. English translation patch is still in development for like 2 years lol.
Does anyone know who the artist that drew the cover page and the first story?
